sentence.Network_en: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.

sentence.Network_en: Her children had the best, most elaborate birthday parties in the neighborhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的孩子们的生日聚会在街坊四邻里是最好、最讲究的。

sentence.Network_en: The neighborhood is given over to performers, stilt walkers and drag queens.
sentence.Network_cn: 社区变成了玩杂耍的、踩高跷的和扮装皇后的天地。

stems_affixes.word_buile: neighbor邻居+ing表形容词→adj.邻近的, 接壤的

neighbor邻居+hood性质→n.附近, 邻近
